example.text: Extremist GOP members are sending a dangerous message to servicewomen that says, ‘we expect you to make life & death decisions for our national security, but you can’t be trusted to make your own health care decisions.’ I won’t stand by while the GOP infringes on servicewomen’s… [[url]] [[url]]
